info.description:
"""

curiel@irit.fr

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to create logical 
models from Sign Language video corpora.

This software is governed by the CeCILL  license under French law and
abiding by the rules of distribution of free software.  You can  use,

As a counterpart to the access to the source code and  rights to copy,

In this respect, the user's attention is drawn to the risks associated
with loading,  using,  modifying and/or developing or reproducing the
software by the user in light of its specific status of free software,
that may mean  that it is complicated to manipulate,  and  that  also
therefore means  that it is reserved for developers  and  experienced
professionals having in-depth computer knowledge. Users are therefore
encouraged to load and test the software's suitability as regards their

Sign Language Logical Model Creator

This software uses tracking information of Sign Language articulators, creates
a logical model, detects logically described sign language structures and 
generates an automatic annotation (ELAN file format).

***Version 5.0.0.1***
info.name: nixtla
info.summary: Formulae-based annotation for Sign Language corpora
